blog.name: thevideogameartarchive
blog.title: The Video Game Art Archive
blog.description:
The Video Game Art Archive is dedicated to scanning and extracting classic video game artwork at the best resolutions possible!

Support us on Patreon!
We update four times a day with new artwork from long forgotten games that have never had their art available. Looking for a specific game? Check out the Archive! You might get lucky!
Also follow our other blog: Want to help us continue our work? Help via PayPAL

summary: Old but good! One of my @linktober pieces from 2017. I had just started my job so I didn’t get very far on prompts that year,...
caption: Old but good! One of my @linktober pieces from 2017. I had just started my job so I didn’t get very far on prompts that year, but I still had fun with what I managed! This piece was all ballpoint pens and highlighters I had around my desk :D

reblog.comment: Old but good! One of my @linktober pieces from 2017. I had just started my job so I didn’t get very far on prompts that year, but I still had fun with what I managed! This piece was all ballpoint pens and highlighters I had around my desk :D

summary: FETH Seasons of Warfare
body:
FETH Seasons of Warfare

Am I the only one disappointed with it? You get an art book, steel book, soundtrack and calander with it. For an extra 40$.I know the EU edition comes with pins and a usb with the soundtrack on it, which is personally prefer over the calander. I wish it was just a little less expensive. Like 80-85$.

That’s just my personal opinion, what do you guys think?

summary: Nintendo released a relationships focused trailer for My Time at Portia this Valentine’s Day and it’s nice to see a video on the...
caption: Nintendo released a relationships focused trailer for My Time at Portia this Valentine’s Day and it’s nice to see a video on the official Nintendo youtube channel spotlighting same gender relationships and I just spent the last 10 minutes reporting homophobic comments this is how I’m spending my night anyway happy valentine’s day(:

summary: Rune Factory! 💜 I AM SO EXCITED! When this was announced, my phone tripped of the notifications i got 😅 I just love this series,...
caption:
Rune Factory! 💜 I AM SO EXCITED! When this was announced, my phone tripped of the notifications i got 😅 I just love this series, and i even didnt expect ever to get a new one! 😁 Rune Factory 4 is sadly not released Physicaly over here, but i bought it on the eshop! 😁 Oceans was just amazing, and the First 3 where much fun too! 4 even became my fav 3ds game so far! 💜 I can’t wat for its remake, and ofc 5! 😍 Thats a dream! I hope so much that they make the game like oceans! 💜 Anyway, i have this Rune Factory shot to share for my excitement! 💜 Check out the accounts tagged! 💜
______________________________

blog.name: pokemon-professor-sakura
blog.title: Asks: CLOSED! Submissions: OPEN!
blog.description:
(This is a roleplay blog run by @chickadee567)

((Talking out of character))

Hello there! I’m Professor Sakura, and I’m always willing

to help trainers and caretakers with their Pokemon.

You can ask me about Pokemon behavior, where certain Pokemon can be found,

and even report sightings of rare or mythical Pokemon.

((Search for the tag #rules to find rules for asks and submissions!))

summary: Poseidon just gave Blaze a chocolate-covered Razz berry for valentine’s day. I have never seen a Pokemon’s face turn so red so...
body:
Poseidon just gave Blaze a chocolate-covered Razz berry for valentine’s day. I have never seen a Pokemon’s face turn so red so quickly in my entire life.

- Professor Sakura
